title: Explore your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages library locations, use lib_summary() special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(libminer) ## basic example code lib_summary() #>                                                                       Library #> 1                                          C:/Program Files/R/R-4.4.1/library #> 2                                                                C:/R_library #> 3 C:/Users/McGivneyK/AppData/Local/Temp/1/RtmpeKLxgU/temp_libpath43382ed439af #>   n_packages #> 1         29 #> 2        402 #> 3          1 summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00
